amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to initiate military operations against Iran except in accordance with Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available by the Act from being used to initiate military operations against Iran except in accordance with Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 262 (Roll no. 300).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
